info.headline: Fire Warning issued April 22 at 1:50PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Mora County Sheriff`s Department. The Calf Canyon Fire is rapidly spreading northeast. This dangerous wildfire will be at the Mora County line by 800 PM MDT and Buena Vista by midnight MDT. Evacuations have been ordered for Penasco Blanco, South Carmen, Ledoux, Upper Murphy, Santiago Creek, Abuelo, Puertocito, Rito Cebolla, Buena Vista, and all nearby communities. Evacuation centers have been established at the former Memorial Middle School at 947 Old National Road off Legion Drive in Las Vegas as well as the Raton Convention Center. Heavy smoke is impacting the area and will continue to expand in coverage toward the north and east through the evening.
